statements: UPDATE email_marketing_lists SET age = 30 WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE email_marketing_lists SET location = 'New York' WHERE customer_id = 2;
UPDATE email_marketing_lists SET behavior = 'Active' WHERE customer_id = 3;
UPDATE email_marketing_lists SET age = age + 1 WHERE gender = 'M'
UPDATE email_marketing_lists SET interests = 'Music, Sports' WHERE location LIKE '%New York%'
UPDATE email_marketing_lists SET behavior = 'Active' WHERE age BETWEEN 18 AND 30
UPDATE customer_demographics SET age = 35 WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE customer_behavior SET visit_count = 10 WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE customer_demographics SET location = 'New York' WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
UPDATE customer_demographics SET name = 'John Doe', age = 30, location = 'New York' WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE customer_behavior SET purchase_history = '[{"product": "Phone", "price": 1000}, {"product": "Laptop", "price": 1500}]', visit_count = 10, last_login = '2022-01-20 08:30:00', subscription_status = true WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';

UPDATE customer_behavior SET purchase_history = '[{"product": "Tablet", "price": 800}, {"product": "Smartwatch", "price": 300}]', visit_count = 5, last_login = '2022-01-25 10:15:00', subscription_status = false WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
UPDATE customer_demographics SET age = 30 WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE customer_behaviors SET subscription_status = 'active' WHERE customer_id = 2;
UPDATE customer_interests SET interests = 'Music, Sports' WHERE customer_id = 3;
UPDATE customer_demographics SET age = 30, location = 'New York' WHERE customer_id = 101
UPDATE customer_behaviors SET subscription_status = 'Active', last_activity = '2022-01-15 08:30:00' WHERE customer_id = 201
UPDATE customer_interests SET interests = 'Sports, Music' WHERE customer_id = 301
UPDATE customers SET first_name='John' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE demographics SET income=75000 WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE behaviors SET subscription_status='Active' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE customers SET age = 30, location = 'New York' WHERE customer_id = 123456;
UPDATE demographics SET income = 75000.00, education_level = 'Bachelor's Degree', occupation = 'Engineer' WHERE customer_id = 123456;
UPDATE behaviors SET subscription_status = 'Active', purchase_history = 'New purchase made on 10/15/2021' WHERE customer_id = 123456;
UPDATE customer_demographics SET age = 30 WHERE customer_id = 123;
UPDATE customer_interests SET interest_level = 3 WHERE customer_id = 456 AND interest_category = 'Sports';
UPDATE email_lists SET list_description = 'New list description' WHERE list_id = 789;
UPDATE customer_demographics SET age = age + 1 WHERE age < 40;
UPDATE customer_behaviors SET purchase_history = CONCAT(purchase_history, 'new_purchase') WHERE customer_id = 100;
UPDATE customer_interests SET interest_level = 2 WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customer_demographics WHERE location = 'New York');
